title: Custom New Tab Page
name: custom-new-tab-page
description: A Firefox extension that allows you to specify a custom URL to be shown when opening a new tab, without changing the address bar content
author: MethodGrab

scripts.start: jpm run --binary "C:\Program Files (x86)\Firefox Developer Edition\firefox.exe" -p dev-edition-default

preferences.name: customNewTabUrl
preferences.title: New Tab URL
preferences.description: The URL to show when a new tab is opened
